FuncDef: This command configures the resolution mode in the automatic binding of a BGP-EVPN MPLS service to tunnels to MP-BGP peers.

ParaDef.Info: Enables the binding to any supported tunnel type in a BGP-EVPN MPLS context following TTM preference.
Disables the automatic binding of a BGP-EVPN MPLS service to tunnels to MP-BGP peers.
Enables the binding to the subset of tunnel types configured under resolution-filter.
